name: urbanize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to build houses, offices, etc. in an area of countryside so that it becomes a town

Related word

Add to word list
Add to word list
to build on land in the countryside so that the area becomes part of a town or city: Two million rural residents will move into newly urbanized areas just outside the city. Japan is a highly urbanized country. urbanization noun [ U ] (UK also urbanisation)
Increasing urbanization is accelerating the economic development of the area.
